title: How to prepare for the UPPSC exam 2021? Which books should I prefer - Quora
tags: Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission Exam
Exam and Test Prep Book Recommendations

response.answer_text: KEEP IT SIMPLE. Less resource More Revision. Please go through the syllabus. Cover all the essential books comprehensively. Laxmikanth (Polity), All important NCERTs, Environment & Science and tech Current and previous years, Indian art and culture (Nitin Singhania), Spectrum for Modern Indian History, Also UP Special is important for UPPSC Mrunal » Competitive exams Preparation for Geography videos, Previous years for Hindi, Previous Years for CSAT . Make short notes on each and every topic of General Studies. Complete the optional at least once before Prelims. Have a good answer writing practice before Prelims. Read The Hindu/The Indian Express/Dainik jagran rashtriya sanskaran Follow monthly current affairs magazine. Revision is the Key.
